effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.
effect_entries.short_effect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.
